0.text: Innate: Neeko is offered a selection of allied  champions to take their appearance. She can choose a new champion to switch her disguise or select herself to deactivate her disguise while Inherent Glamour is not on cooldown.

1.text: While disguised, Neeko can use basic attacks while keeping her form. Taking damage from enemy champions, or casting either  Blooming Burst or  Tangle-Barbs or initiating  Pop Blossom's leap breaks the illusion and puts Inherent Glamour on full  cooldown.

2.text: Disguising as a champion or deactivating the disguise places Inherent Glamour on a 2-second cooldown.

0.text: Active: Neeko propels a seed at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies within the area.

1.text: If the seed kills an enemy or deals damage to a champion or large  monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.

0.text: Passive: Basic attacks  on-hit grant Neeko a stack of Shapesplitter, stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, Neeko's next basic attack  on-attack consumes the stacks to turn her attack into a  non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.

1.text: Active: Neeko summons a  clone of her  current form for 3 seconds, which moves a fixed distance in the target direction. The clone is  untargetable to allies and for the first 0.5 seconds of its lifespan to enemies.

2.text: Both Neeko and her clone additionally become  invisible for 0.5 seconds and gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

0.text: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and  rooting them for a duration.

1.text: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it thereafter has its size, speed, and root duration increased.

0.text: Active: Neeko winds up with spiritual essence over 1.25 seconds, highlighting the area around herself. This is not shown to enemies while she is  disguised.

1.text: After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air over the duration, gaining a  shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each enemy  champion that is closeby when it is gained.

2.text: When the cast time ends, Neeko lands to burst out the energy, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
